gov.nih.nlm.ling.util

Class DiscourseUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • gov.nih.nlm.ling.util.DiscourseUtils

  • public class DiscourseUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    A class that contains static utility methods for discourse-level processing.
    Author:
    Halil Kilicoglu

    • Method Detail

      • sameSentence

        public static boolean sameSentence(SurfaceElement surf1,
                                   SurfaceElement surf2)
        Determines whether two textual units are in the same sentence.
        Parameters:
        surf1 - the first textual unit
        surf2 - the second textual unit
        Returns:
        true if surf1 and surf2 are in the same sentence

      • withinNSentence

        public static boolean withinNSentence(Sentence a,
                                      Sentence b,
                                      int n)
        Determines whether two sentences are within a predefined number of sentences from each other.
        Parameters:
        a - the first sentence
        b - the second sentence
        n - the max. number of acceptable sentences
        Returns:
        true if distance between the sentences is less than or equal to n (in terms of sentences).
